Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: input
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: The input element this transition applies to

Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: output
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: The output element this transition applies to

Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: transition
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: A function that specify how the parameters are transformed for an input into an output

Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: isValid(forInput:output:)
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: Checks if a transition is valid given an input and output

Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: performTransition(inputElement:)
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: Performs a transition of an inputElement into an output

Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.name: LSystemParametersTransition
Structs/LSystemParametersTransition.html.abstract: A struct that defines how the parameters from an input element translate into the parameters for an output element

Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..name: iterations
Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..abstract: The amount of iterations that have been performed so far

Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..name: string
Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..abstract: The string of the previous iteration output

Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..name: LSystemRuleContextAwareSource
Protocols/LSystemRuleContextAwareSource..abstract: Describes something that can be seen as a source of context for context-aware rules

Enums/WeightedListErrors.html#/s:6Angelo.name: InvalidWeight
Enums/WeightedListErrors.html#/s:6Angelo.abstract: Error thrown if an element with invalid weight is added into the list

Enums/LSystemErrors.html#/s:6Angelo13LSy.name: RuleWithInvalidWeight
Enums/LSystemErrors.html#/s:6Angelo13LSy.abstract: An error thrown if a rule with invalid weight is added into the LSystem

Enums/LSystemNoRuleBehavior.html#/s:6Ang.name: keep
Enums/LSystemNoRuleBehavior.html#/s:6Ang.abstract: The element is kept into the output (basically a rule where element -> element)

Enums/LSystemNoRuleBehavior.html.name: LSystemNoRuleBehavior
Enums/LSystemNoRuleBehavior.html.abstract: Describes how an LSystem should behave when no rules are available for an element

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: count
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: The count of elements in the list

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: isEmpty
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: A Bool that returns if the list is empty

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: totalWeight
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: The sum of the weight of all elements in th list

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: elements
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: The list of elements with its respective weights

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: sortByWeight()
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: Sorts the internal elements list by weight

Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.name: randomElement()
Classes/WeightedList.html#/s:6Angelo12We.abstract: Gets a random element from the list

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: ParameterCheck
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: A typealias for the function that checks the parameter from an LSystemElement

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: ContextAwareCheck
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: A typealias for the function that checks the context from a LSystemRuleContextAwareSource and the index of the element that is being evaluated

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: input
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: The input that this rule applies to

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: outputs
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: The outputs this rule generates

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: weight
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: The weight of this rule in the L-System

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: parameterCheck
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: The function used to check if this rule is valid for a given input element

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: contextAwareCheck
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: The function used to check if this rule is valid for the current result context (iterations, string)

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:output:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input and output

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:outputs:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input and outputs

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:output:weight:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, an output and a weight

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:outputs:weight:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, outputs and a weight

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:output:weight:parameterCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, an output, a weight and a parameter check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:outputs:weight:parameterCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, outputs, a weight and a parameter check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:output:weight:contextAwareCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, an output, a weight and a context-aware check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:outputs:weight:contextAwareCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, an output, a weight and a context-aware check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:output:weight:parameterCheck:contextAwareCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, an output, a weight, a parameter check and a context-aware check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: init(input:outputs:weight:parameterCheck:contextAwareCheck:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Creates a new rule based on an input, outputs, a weight, a parameter check and a context-aware check

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: isValid(forInputElement:elementIndex:contextAwareComponentSource:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Checks if a rule is valid given an input element

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: apply(inputElement:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Applies the rule given an input element

Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.name: apply(inputElement:transitions:)
Classes/LSystemRule.html#/s:6Angelo11LSy.abstract: Applies the rule given an input element and a list of transitions

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: inputElement
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The input element that was used in this results

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: iterationsPerformed
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The iterations this results has performed so far

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: parameterKeyValueSeparator
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The separator used between a parameter key and its value

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: parameterStartDelimiter
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The delimiter used to define the beginning of a list of parameters

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: parameterEndDelimiter
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The delimiter used to define the end of a list of parameters

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: stringWithParameters
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The results in a string format, with its parameters

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: init(initialElement:)
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: Creates an LSystemResult based on an initial element

Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.name: iterations
Classes/LSystemResult.html#/s:6Angelo13L.abstract: The amount of iterations performed to create this LSystemResult

Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.name: getParameter(named:)
Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.abstract: Returns the value of a parameter in the dictionary

Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.name: parameterKeys()
Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.abstract: Returns the keys of the parameters dictionary

Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.name: stringWithParameters(startDelimiter:keyValueSeparator:separator:endDelimiter:)
Classes/LSystemElement.html#/s:6Angelo14.abstract: Transform an LSystemElement, with its parameters, into a String

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: rules
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: The current rules this LSystem will use when transforming a LSystemResult

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: transitions
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: The transitions this LSystem can use when applying rules

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: noRuleBehavior
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: How the LSystem should behave when no rules are available for an input element

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: getAvailableRules(forInputElement:elementIndex:contextAwareComponentSource:)
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: Gets all rules that are available for a specific input element

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: produceOutput(input:iterations:)
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: Produces an LSystemResult based on a input string and a set number of iterations

Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.name: produceOutput(inputElement:iterations:)
Classes/LSystem.html#/s:6Angelo7LSystemC.abstract: Produces an LSystemResult based on a input element (which might have parameters) and a set number of iterations

Classes/LSystem.html.name: LSystem
Classes/LSystem.html.abstract: An L-System that supports both basic L-Systems as well as rules with weights and checks and elements with parameters

Classes/LSystemElement.html.name: LSystemElement
Classes/LSystemElement.html.abstract: An element that can be used in an LSystem

Classes/LSystemRule.html.name: LSystemRule
Classes/LSystemRule.html.abstract: A rule that describes in what each element in the L-System is transformed into

Classes/WeightedList.html.name: WeightedList
Classes/WeightedList.html.abstract: A list in which elements can have different weights
